attributes.additional_details:
Introducing an Electronic System for Travel Authorization (ESTA) would make the United Kingdom a lot safer. Especially by taking the fingerprints of the tourists visiting the UK. Furthermore by having a 10 pound registration fee for each Tourist by limiting the ESTA for one year the UK could gain through that 292 million pounds per year (as there are 29,2 million tourists per year).

The Government should introduce an ESTA in the UK!
